attributes.review: I was honestly so excited to download this app to be able to support the most amazing most smartest most beautiful president our country has ever had and immediately after I got it my phone glitched and a video of mike pence came up on my phone and he was laughing maniacally at me. I tried to turn off my phone but it got worse. My entire screen then turned completely orange it gave me two options to cancel and to continue. I aggressively pressed cancel but after a minute of that there was a loud knock on my front door, I opened the door and my block was filled with black suvs, two men in dark glasses were standing on my porch then flashed a bright light at my face and thatâ€™s the last thing I remembered before I woke up in an interrogation room in what I believed was mainland China they put a computer in front of my face with all my personal information, mike then walked in and forced me to type my social security number when I refused they all left and told me they would be coming back to torture me. Jumping up on the table I quickly found my way out through the air vents, there was a hoverboard on the roof and I escaped home on that, getting pooped on by birds and almost plummeting towards earth. After 13 hours I had arrived home where my home had been robbed a streak of Cheeto dust everywhere I looked. Do not download this app I am now homeless and the Chinese government is looking for me.
